foreignData.name: Illusionsrüstung
foreignData.text: Verzaubert eine KreaturDie verzauberte Kreatur erhält +4/+4.Wenn die verzauberte Kreatur das Ziel eines Zauberspruchs oder einer Fähigkeit wird, opfere die Illusionsrüstung.

foreignData.name: Armadura ilusoria
foreignData.text: Encantar criatura.La criatura encantada obtiene +4/+4.Cuando la criatura encantada sea objetivo de un hechizo o habilidad, sacrifica la Armadura ilusoria.

foreignData.name: Armure illusoire

foreignData.name: Armatura Illusoria
foreignData.text: Incanta creaturaLa creatura incantata prende +4/+4.Quando la creatura incantata diventa bersaglio di una magia o abilità, sacrifica l'Armatura Illusoria.

foreignData.name: 幻影の鎧

name: Illusionary Armor
originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +4/+4.
When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice Illusionary Armor.

rulings.text: Only Illusionary Armor is sacrificed because of its triggered ability; the enchanted creature is not.

text:

Enchanted creature gets +4/+4.
